Title: Project Starlight
Description: Project Starlight provides native controls, Silverlight libraries, and a sample player to allow the viewing of multicast (MSB) streams in a Silverlight application.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Project Starlight provides native controls, Silverlight libraries, and a sample player to allow the viewing of multicast (MSB) streams in a Silverlight application.

Version 2.0 is released
Version 2.0 beta 1 is released
Version 1.0 is released

Player Integeration Guide has been uploaded to the Developers page.
If you're interested in integrating Project Starlight into your project, this document will get you started.

To learn more about Project Starlight click the links below.
